### âš›ï¸ [**Quantum Information Science**](./quantum_computing)
Projects in this section focus on **quantum computation, quantum algorithms, and quantum simulations**.  
They highlight applications ranging from **adiabatic quantum computing** and **quantum control theory** to more general explorations of quantum information and computation.  
The goal is to investigate how computational and physical methods can solve complex problems, simulate quantum systems, and provide insights at the intersection of physics, mathematics, and computing.
